sentences.sContent: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.sCn: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.sContent: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.sCn: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.sContent: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.sCn: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

sentences.sContent: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.sCn: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

sentences.sContent: ...and began to test her: he would give her a date and ask her to tell him about the world events on that day...
...where one could ask their older brothers and sisters to help...
...I just want to ask them one question...
...But I ask my father if he texted messages...
...and ask for directions from a human...
...and would you like to ask me any questions...
...What question did the man ask the woman...
...so they won’t ask their children to help them to do the housework...

synos.tran: 问，询问；要求；需要；邀请；讨价

trans.tranOther: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution
